resources.string:
This is an unofficial reader for Nedroid (http://nedroid.com) created by Anthony Clark.
If you have any comment or question, feel free to contact me at deggial.cfr@gmail.com 

 This app is based on Gunshow Reader.

 Comic Viewer
This project uses "ComicViewer" (https://github.com/tcoxon/ComicViewer) by tcoxon.

 Source Code and Resources
You can find the source code of this app on https://github.com/deggialcfr/NedroidReader under GPL license. Icon is a cutout of a comic by Anthony Clark.
